sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Image from "../../assets/cardimage"; import { Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./cards.css"; const cards = (props) => { let arr = [ "Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday", ]; let day = arr[new Date(props.lists.dt_txt).getDay()]; return (

{day}

 {props.lists.main.temp} °C{" "} {/* Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. */}

{props.lists.weather[0].description}

Humidity: {props.lists.main.humidity}
Visibility: {props.lists.visibility}
{/*

{day}

{props.lists.main.temp} °C

{props.lists.weather[0].description}

Max : {props.lists.main.temp_max}
Min: {props.lists.main.temp_min}
Humidity: {props.lists.main.humidity}
Visibility: {props.lists.visibility}
*/} ); }; export default cards;
